channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Isa Guha introduces live coverage from day four of Wimbledon, one of the highlights of the sporting summer. On this day in 2024, British wild card Jacob Fearnley took a set off seven-time champion Novak Djokovic on Centre Court. It proved to be a real springboard for the Scot, who has powered up the rankings this year to earn direct entry into the Wimbledon draw.
